item.title: DNS
item.description: Linux Windows Zone Transfer dig +noall +answer @<NAME_SERVER> <DOMAIN> AXFR $ dig +noall +answer snoopy.htb axfr @10.10.11.212 snoopy.htb. 86400 IN SOA ns1.snoopy.htb. ns2.snoopy.htb. 2022032612 3600 1800 604800 86400 snoopy.htb. 86400 IN NS ns1.snoopy.htb. snoopy.htb. 86400 IN NS ns2.snoopy.htb. mattermost.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 172.18.0.3 mm.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 127.0.0.1 ns1.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 10.0.50.10 ns2.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 10.0.51.10 postgres.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 172.18.0.2 provisions.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 172.18.0.4 www.snoopy.htb. 86400 IN A 127.
